title: How to Play Bloons TD Battles

steps.headline: Get a Ninja Kiwi account.
steps.description: You cannot play without an account.

steps.headline: When you see the menu, click quick battle or private battle.
Choose mode, either assault or defend.
Let the auto-matching mechanism help you.
Choose 4 towers.
steps.description: These towers will be the only towers you're allowed to use during the match.

steps.headline: Click a tower to purchase it.
steps.description: If the tower appears red, then you don't have enough money.

steps.headline: Click on the map to place the tower.
steps.description: The black circle highlights the tower's ranger, with the exceptions of Sniper, Dartling Gun and Mortar.

steps.headline: Click on one of the Bloon icons to send out bloons in assault mode.
steps.description: One of the deadliest attacks is a regen rainbow rush. Keep this in mind when sending bloons. If in defence mode, click on one of the economy boost packages to purchase it.

steps.headline: You will receive a set amount of money called your "income" every six seconds.
steps.description: You can increase this amount by sending out bloons or buying economy booster packs.

steps.headline: Always increase your income.
steps.description: Doing this will help you gain more cash over time.

steps.headline: Make sure your towers can handle grouped bloons as well as spaced ones in assault mode as the other player will know to play to your weakness.
Make sure you have good camo detection.
steps.description: Otherwise, camo bloons will be the end of you.

steps.headline: Make sure you can pop camo leads by round twelve.
steps.description:
Some good camo lead popping towers are:
1/2 sniper monkey
x/3 monkey buccaneer
x/3 ninja monkey
x/2 dartling gun
x/2 monkey apprentice.

text:
Get Started Get a Ninja Kiwi account. You cannot play without an account. When you see the menu, click quick battle or private battle.  Choose mode, either assault or defend.  Let the auto-matching mechanism help you.  Finished.  Gameplay Choose 4 towers. These towers will be the only towers you're allowed to use during the match. Click a tower to purchase it. If the tower appears red, then you don't have enough money. Click on the map to place the tower. The black circle highlights the tower's ranger, with the exceptions of Sniper, Dartling Gun and Mortar. Click on one of the Bloon icons to send out bloons in assault mode. One of the deadliest attacks is a regen rainbow rush. Keep this in mind when sending bloons. If in defence mode, click on one of the economy boost packages to purchase it. You will receive a set amount of money called your "income" every six seconds. You can increase this amount by sending out bloons or buying economy booster packs. Strategy Always increase your income. Doing this will help you gain more cash over time. Make sure your towers can handle grouped bloons as well as spaced ones in assault mode as the other player will know to play to your weakness.  Make sure you have good camo detection. Otherwise, camo bloons will be the end of you. Make sure you can pop camo leads by round twelve. Some good camo lead popping towers are:
1/2 sniper monkey
x/3 monkey buccaneer
x/3 ninja monkey
x/2 dartling gun
x/2 monkey apprentice.
